name: Wavetouched Paragon
summary: You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish.
description:
You have been blessed by the sea, granting you the ability to swim like a fish. You gain a 15-foot swim Speed.

Special If you have the Bonuwat Wavetouched background, you can take this feat at 1st level instead of 5th.Traits

Human: A creature with this trait is a member of the human ancestry. Humans are a diverse array of people known for their adaptability. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by humans.
